alert.note: Alert for Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 11 at 5:06PM MDT until April 12 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...SPRING SNOW CONTINUES ACROSS PARTS OF THE INLAND NW... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM PDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. * WHERE...Nezperce, Soldiers Meadow Road, Craigmont and Winchester. * WHEN...Until 11 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Monday evening and Tuesday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lewis and Southern Nez Perce Counties
